name: ColorBoost
description:
ColorBoost

ColorBoost is a racing game developed for GGJ 2022 with the theme duality.

Drive as quickly as you can to complete the track, be careful that your color and road elements are matched if you want to use them.

Controls

Game is playable with Keyboard or Gamepad

ControlKeyboardGamepadSteeringA,DLeft StickThrottle, SpeedWBottom Button, Right Shoulder TriggerBrakeSLeft Shoulder TriggerSwap ColorShift, KGamepad Right Face ButtonReset To CheckpointR, BackspaceMenu / Left Special ButtonTo MenuEscapeRight Special Button Credits

Programming & Car-Rigging: Sebastian Krause | Art: Johannes Grewer, Dario Falcke 

Asset Packs

Dreamscape Nature : Meadows 
Stylized Open World Environment by Polyart Studio
Stylized Forest by TomkaGS

Music track 

The Whip (Extended Version) by Kevin MacLeod Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4514-the-whip-extended-version-
